metadata.name: CROSS
metadata.description:
I always carry a heavy burden.  
Even when I find a glimmer of light in the depths of darkness and reach out my hand, there is nothing there.  
Nevertheless, I do not lose hope in my heart.  

[Artistic Intent]  
A cross, symbolizing a heavy burden, and a desolate world in the background.  
The woman in the painting shines with hope even in the midst of the devastated world.  
This is the meaning that was conveyed through the painting.
